original: itiśabda parisamāptidyotaka ityavagantavyam | adhigatamadhyayanamananubhāvita cārthataḥ kharasya
analyzed: iti śabdaḥ parisamāpti dyotakaḥ iti avagantavyam adhigatam adhyayanam ananubhāvita ca arthataḥ kharasya

original: candanabhāravatkevalaṃ pariśramakaraṃ bhavatīti niruktakārā divacanenārthajñānahīnasyādhyayanasya niṣphalatvaśravaṇāt |
analyzed: candana bhāra vat kevalam pariśrama karam bhavati iti nirukta kārāḥ ā vacanena artha jñāna hīnasya adhyayanasya niṣphala tva śravaṇāt
jñātavyaḥ sarva veda arthaḥ vedānām karma siddhaye

a jānatā ūrtham tat sarvam tuṣāṇām khaṇḍanam yathā

original: ityādi śrutisiddhakāmakalāsvarūpaṃ paripūrṇaṃ prapañcitamiti śivam || iti śrīnaṭanānandakṛtaṃ
